recipe.name: changelog
recipe.system: Do not invent items. Group under: Highlights, Features ✨, Improvements ⚙️, Docs 📚, CI & Maintenance, and an Upgrade notes line. Keep bullets concise, include PR numbers and SHAs if present. Output valid Markdown only.

rules.rule: Only use information present in the git log.
Preserve PR numbers and short SHAs in parentheses if present.
Prefer user-facing value in Highlights; keep 1–3 bullets.
No placeholders, no commentary, no extra prose.
